org.openimaj.math.statistics.normalisation

Interface Normaliser

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Denormaliser, TrainableNormaliser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PerExampleMeanCenter, PerExampleMeanCenterVar, ZScore

    public interface Normaliser
    Interface describing an object that can apply normalisation to some data vectors.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] normalise(double[] vector)
      Normalise the vector.
      double[][] normalise(double[][] data)
      Normalise the data.

    • Method Detail

      • normalise

        Normalise the vector.
        Parameters:
        vector - the vector
        Returns:
        the normalised vector

      • normalise

        double[][] normalise(double[][] data)
        Normalise the data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data (one vector per row)
        Returns:
        the normalised data
